text: Madan Tiwary (1923 â€“ 2011) was an Indian politician. He was elected to the Lok Sabha, the lower house of the Parliament of India from Rajnandgaon, Madhya Pradesh as a member of the Janata Party. == References == Category:Politicians from Madhya Pradesh Category:1923 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Members of the Lok Sabha
title: Madan Tiwary
